content: copyright auguste knit 2024 all rights reserved cashmere twist scrunchie a knitted cashmere scrunchie is a luxurious accessory combining practicality of a traditional scrunchie with the indulgence of high-quality cashmere without pulling our damaging your hair it will for sure add a touch of elegance to any hairstyle fun easy and fast to knit you will have created a new favorite accessory in no time gauge 22 sts x 26 rnds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette sts using 4 mm us6 needles needles 4 mm us6 circular needles yarn 10g cardiff cashmere classic 100 % cashmere - 112 m / 122 yds / 25 g color neve notions one regular thin rubber hairband stitch marker tapestry needle abbreviations bobble bind off back insert the right needle into the back bor beginning of round of the st and knit through the back of the co cast on loop 1 st increased k knit round round m1l take the loop between the two sl slip stitches on your left needle from front to sts stitches instructions co 100 sts using regular co method on 4 mm us6 circular needles place a marker to indicate bor join to work in the round work in stockinette st until your work measures 4 cm / 1 6 from the co edge now you fold your work double and knit your sts together with your co sts so that you knit through both your cast on st and your regular st placing the hairband on the inside of the double folded scrunchie work to the end of the round like this next round k all sts next round increase round *k2 m1l* repeat to end next round k all sts copyright auguste knit 2024 all rights reserved bobble all sts using i-cord bobble method as follows co 3 new sts using knit on cast on method *k2 k2tog tbl sl sts back to lh needle* repeat * to * until you have 3 sts left of work break yarn and pull it through last 3 sts with a tapestry needle and fasten on the ws weave in all ends copyright auguste knit 2024 all rights reserved // instagram @augusteknit this pattern is for private use only and should not be copied or sold forward you are more then welcome to share your version of the cashmere twist scrunchie on instagram with the hashtag #cashmeretwistscrunchie #augusteknit happy knitting copyright auguste knit 2024 all rights reserved
